00014 #ifndef SECONDARYDRIVER_H_
00015 #define SECONDARYDRIVER_H_
00016 
00017 #include "driver.h"
00018 #include "xitemnode.h"
00019 
00020 //! Base class for all instrument drivers
00021 class XSecondaryDriver : public XDriver
00022 {
00023     XNODE_OBJECT
00024 protected:
00025     XSecondaryDriver(const char *name, bool runtime,
00026         const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00027         const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00028         const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00029         const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00030 public:
00031     virtual ~XSecondaryDriver();
00032 
00033     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00034     virtual void showForms() = 0;
00035 
00036     virtual const shared_ptr<XRecordDependency> dependency() const {return m_dependency;}
00037 protected:
00038     //! call this to receive signal/data
00039     void connect(const shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase> &item, bool check_deep_dep = true);
00040     //! check dependencies and lock all records and analyze
00041     //! null pointer will be passed to analyze()
00042     //! emitter is driver itself.
00043     //! \sa analyze(), checkDependency()
00044     void requestAnalysis();
00045     //! unlock one of connections in order to change the state of that instrument.
00046     void unlockConnection(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &connected);
00047 
00048     //! this is called when connected driver emit a signal
00049     //! unless dependency is broken
00050     //! all connected drivers are readLocked
00051     virtual void analyze(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) throw (XRecordError&) = 0;
00052     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00053     //! record is readLocked
00054     //! this must be reentrant unlike analyze()
00055     virtual void visualize() = 0;
00056     //! check connected drivers have valid time
00057     //! \return true if dependency is resolved
00058     //! this must be reentrant unlike analyze()
00059     virtual bool checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const = 0;
00060 
00061     //! usually nothing to do
00062     virtual void start() {}
00063     //! usually nothing to do
00064     virtual void stop() {}
00065 private:
00066     void readLockAllConnections();
00067     void readUnlockAllConnections();
00068 
00069     //! \ret true if dependency is resolved
00070     bool checkDeepDependency(shared_ptr<XRecordDependency> &) const;
00071 
00072     shared_ptr<XRecordDependency> m_dependency;
00073 
00074     //! holds connections
00075     std::vector<shared_ptr<const XDriver> > m_connections;
00076     std::vector<shared_ptr<const XDriver> > m_connections_check_deep_dep;
00077     XRWLock m_connection_mutex;
00078     typedef std::vector<shared_ptr<const XDriver> >::const_iterator tConnection_it;
00079     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnRecord;
00080     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnBeforeItemChanged;
00081     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnItemChangedCheckDeepDep;
00082     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnItemChanged;
00083     //! called by connected drivers
00084     //! does dependency checks, readLock all connected drivers, write
00085     //! and finally call purely virtual function analyze();
00086     void onConnectedRecorded(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &);
00087     void beforeItemChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &item);
00088     void onItemChangedCheckDeepDep(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &item);
00089     void onItemChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &item);
00090 };
00091 
00092 #endif /*SECONDARYDRIVER_H_*/
